function readCookie(name) {
    var nameEQ = name + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for ( var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
        var c = ca[i];
        while (c.charAt(0) == ' ')
            c = c.substring(1, c.length);
        if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
            return c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length);
    }
    return null;
}

    <script type="text/plain" class="optanon-category-C0002">
    (function() {
      var datasets = [
                          "ceed-us"               ];

      var posElts = document.getElementsByClassName("pos dpos");
      var entryPos = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < posElts.length; i++) {
        var pos = posElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryPos.indexOf(pos) == -1)
          entryPos.push(pos);
      }

      var levelElts = document.getElementsByClassName("epp-xref dxref");
      var entryLevels = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < levelElts.length; i++) {
        var level = levelElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryLevels.indexOf(level) == -1)
          entryLevels.push(level);
      }

      plb(
        "setEntryContext",
         "a" ,
        entryPos,
        datasets,
        entryLevels
      );
    })();
  </script>

                    Tell us about this example sentence:                </div>

                <form class="i-amphtml-form" [class]="stateSidebarEntryTellUs.dataset_id == 'NONE' ? 'hdn' : ''" id="formTellUs" method="post" action-xhr="https://dictionary.cambridge.org/putunga/report" target="_top" on="submit-success: AMP.setState({ stateSidebarEntryTellUs: { success: true } })" novalidate="">
                    <div class="fs15">
                        <input type="hidden" name="id" [value]="stateSidebarEntryTellUs.example_id">
                        <input type="hidden" name="dataset" [value]="stateSidebarEntryTellUs.dataset_id">

                        <div class="lbt lb-cm">
                            <label class="tn lp-5 lpt-15 lpb-15 x">
                                <input type="radio" name="reason" class="hfl lmr-10 lmt-2" value="The word in the example sentence does not match the entry word." role="button" tabindex="0">
                                <span class="hdb hoh">
                                    The word in the example sentence does not match the entry word.                                </span>
                            </label>
                        </div>

                        <div class="lbt lb-cm">
                            <label class="tn lp-5 lpt-15 lpb-15 x">
                                <input type="radio" name="reason" class="hfl lmr-10 lmt-2" value="The sentence contains offensive content." role="button" tabindex="0">
                                <span class="hdb hoh">
                                    The sentence contains offensive content.                                </span>
                            </label>
                        </div>

                        <div class="lbt lb-cm x lpt-15">
                            <div [class]="stateSidebarEntryTellUs.success ? 'hdn' : ''">
                                <button class="hfl hao hao hbtn hbtn-tab bhb fon" title="Search" on="tap:sidebarEntryTellUs.close" role="button" aria-label="Close" tabindex="0">
                                    Cancel                                </button>

                                <button type="submit" class="hfr boa hao hbtn hbtn-tab tb tc-bd">
                                    Submit                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div submitting="">
                        <template type="amp-mustache">
                            <div class="pa p0 lp-5 bl-l">
                            <div class="pa p0 bload">
                            </div>
                            </div>
                        </template>
                    </div>
                    <div submit-success="">
                        <template type="amp-mustache">
                            <div class="m ms fs14 lmt-10">
                                Thanks! Your feedback will be reviewed.
                            </div>
                        </template>
                    </div>
                    <div submit-error="">
                        <template type="amp-mustache">
                            <div class="m me fs14 lmt-25">
                                {{#verifyErrors}}
                                    <p>{{message}}</p>
                                {{/verifyErrors}}
                                {{^verifyErrors}}
                                    {{#message}}
                                        <p>{{message}}</p>
                                    {{/message}}
                                    {{^message}}
                                        <p>There was a problem sending your report.</p>
                                    {{/message}}
                                {{/verifyErrors}}
                            </div>
                        </template>
                    </div>
                </form>

                <form class="hdn i-amphtml-form" [class]="stateSidebarEntryTellUs.dataset_id == 'NONE' ? '' : 'hdn'" id="formTellUsDefinition" method="post" action-xhr="https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/rate" target="_top" on="submit-success: AMP.setState({ stateSidebarEntryTellUs: { success: true } })" novalidate="">
                    <div class="fs15">
                        <input type="hidden" name="id" [value]="stateSidebarEntryTellUs.example_id">
                        <input type="hidden" name="rate" [value]="-1">

                        <div class="lbt lb-cm">
                            <label class="tn lp-5 lpt-15 lpb-15 x">
                                <input type="radio" name="reason" class="hfl lmr-10 lmt-2" value="The word in the example sentence does not match the entry word." role="button" tabindex="0">
                                <span class="hdb hoh">
                                    The word in the example sentence does not match the entry word.                                </span>
                            </label>
                        </div>

                        <div class="lbt lb-cm">
                            <label class="tn lp-5 lpt-15 lpb-15 x">
                                <input type="radio" name="reason" class="hfl lmr-10 lmt-2" value="The sentence contains offensive content." role="button" tabindex="0">
                                <span class="hdb hoh">
                                    The sentence contains offensive content.                                </span>
                            </label>
                        </div>

                        <div class="lbt lb-cm x lpt-15">
                            <div [class]="stateSidebarEntryTellUs.success ? 'hdn' : ''">
                                <button class="hfl hao hao hbtn hbtn-tab bhb fon" title="Search" on="tap:sidebarEntryTellUs.close" role="button" aria-label="Close" tabindex="0">
                                    Cancel                                </button>

                                <button type="submit" class="hfr boa hao hbtn hbtn-tab tb tc-bd">
                                    Submit                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div submitting="">
                        <template type="amp-mustache">
                            <div class="pa p0 lp-5 bl-l">
                            <div class="pa p0 bload">
                            </div>
                            </div>
                        </template>
                    </div>
                    <div submit-success="">
                        <template type="amp-mustache">
                            <div class="m ms fs14 lmt-10">
                                Thanks! Your feedback will be reviewed.
                            </div>
                        </template>
                    </div>
                    <div submit-error="">
                        <template type="amp-mustache">
                            <div class="m me fs14 lmt-25">
                                {{#verifyErrors}}
                                    <p>{{message}}</p>
                                {{/verifyErrors}}
                                {{^verifyErrors}}
                                    {{#message}}
                                        <p>{{message}}</p>
                                    {{/message}}
                                    {{^message}}
                                        <p>There was a problem sending your report.</p>
                                    {{/message}}
                                {{/verifyErrors}}
                            </div>
                        </template>
                    </div>
                </form>
            </div>

function readCookie(name) {
    var nameEQ = name + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for ( var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
        var c = ca[i];
        while (c.charAt(0) == ' ')
            c = c.substring(1, c.length);
        if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
            return c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length);
    }
    return null;
}

<script type="text/javascript">
    JSON.parse("{}".replace(/(&quot\;)/g,"\""), (chanel, topic) => {
        if(typeof topic === 'string') {
            sendGAEvent('Channelization', chanel, topic, {'nonInteraction':1});
            // alert(chanel +','+ topic);

    });
</script>

    <script type="text/plain" class="optanon-category-C0002">
    (function() {
      var datasets = [
                          "ceed-us"               ];

      var posElts = document.getElementsByClassName("pos dpos");
      var entryPos = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < posElts.length; i++) {
        var pos = posElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryPos.indexOf(pos) == -1)
          entryPos.push(pos);
      }

      var levelElts = document.getElementsByClassName("epp-xref dxref");
      var entryLevels = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < levelElts.length; i++) {
        var level = levelElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryLevels.indexOf(level) == -1)
          entryLevels.push(level);
      }

      plb(
        "setEntryContext",
         "a" ,
        entryPos,
        datasets,
        entryLevels
      );
    })();
  </script>

  <script type="text/plain" class="optanon-category-C0002">
  var shareFacebook = document.getElementsByClassName("i-facebook");
  var shareTwitter = document.getElementsByClassName("i-twitter");
  var shareInstagram = document.getElementsByClassName("i-instagram");
  for (var i = 0; i < shareFacebook.length; i++) {
    shareFacebook.item(i).addEventListener('click', function(e){
    plb(
      "triggerSocialNetworkShare",
      "facebook"
      );
    });
  }
  for (var i = 0; i < shareTwitter.length; i++) {
    shareTwitter.item(i).addEventListener('click', function(e){
    plb(
      "triggerSocialNetworkShare",
      "twitter"
      );
    });
  }
  for (var i = 0; i < shareInstagram.length; i++) {
    shareInstagram.item(i).addEventListener('click', function(e){
    plb(
      "triggerSocialNetworkShare",
      "instagram"
      );
    });
  }
</script>

<amp-state id="stateSidebarDict" class="i-amphtml-element i-amphtml-layout-container i-amphtml-built" i-amphtml-layout="container" hidden="" aria-hidden="true">
    <script type="application/json">
        {
        "open": false,
        "recent": true,
        "def": true,
        "gram": true,
        "trans": true,
        "pron": true,
        "plus": true
        }
    </script>
</amp-state>

<amp-sidebar id="sidebarDict" layout="nodisplay" side="right" class="bw cm-f i-amphtml-element i-amphtml-layout-nodisplay i-amphtml-overlay i-amphtml-scrollable i-amphtml-built" on="sidebarOpen:AMP.setState({ stateSidebarDict: { open: true } })" hidden="" i-amphtml-layout="nodisplay" role="menu" tabindex="-1"><button class="i-amphtml-screen-reader" tabindex="-1">Close the sidebar</button><button class="i-amphtml-screen-reader" tabindex="-1">Close the sidebar</button>

    <div class="pr cm-fc cms lm-auto">

            <i class="i i-close ibd" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        </span>

        <div class="han tc-bd fs14 lpt-5">

                        </span>

                                            English
                                        </span>
                                        <span tabindex="0" aria-label="Set dictionary search to Grammar" role="button" on="tap:AMP.setState({ stateSearch: { dataset: 'british-grammar', dataset_text: 'Grammar', dataset_search: 'Search Grammar', isbilang: false} }), sidebarDict.close, searchword.focus" class="hp hdb lmb-5 hp">
                                            Grammar

                                        <span tabindex="0" aria-label="Set dictionary search to English–Arabic" role="button" on="tap:AMP.setState({ stateSearch: { dataset: 'english-arabic', dataset_text: 'English–Arabic', dataset_search: 'Search English–Arabic', isbilang: false} }), sidebarDict.close, searchword.focus" class="hp hdb lmb-5 hp">

                                            English–Turkish

function readCookie(name) {
    var nameEQ = name + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for ( var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
        var c = ca[i];
        while (c.charAt(0) == ' ')
            c = c.substring(1, c.length);
        if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
            return c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length);
    }
    return null;
}

var pl_p = localStorage.pl;

#ot-sdk-btn-floating{ display: none}
#ot-sdk-btn.ot-sdk-show-settings,
#ot-sdk-btn.ot-sdk-show-settings:hover{
  border: none;
  background: none;
  display: inline;
  padding: 0;
  color: inherit;
  font-size: inherit;
}
.ot-fade-in {
  animation-name: none !important;
  animation-duration: initial !important;
  animation-timing-function: initial !important;
}

#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-group-container {
    overflow-y: auto !important;
    overflow-x: hidden !important;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 424px) {
  #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-group-container {
    max-height: calc(100vh - 280px) !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (min-width: 425px) {
  #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-group-container {
    max-height: calc(100vh - 200px) !important;
  }

    <script type="text/plain" class="optanon-category-C0002">
    (function() {
      var datasets = [
                          "ceed-us"               ];

      var posElts = document.getElementsByClassName("pos dpos");
      var entryPos = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < posElts.length; i++) {
        var pos = posElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryPos.indexOf(pos) == -1)
          entryPos.push(pos);
      }

      var levelElts = document.getElementsByClassName("epp-xref dxref");
      var entryLevels = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < levelElts.length; i++) {
        var level = levelElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryLevels.indexOf(level) == -1)
          entryLevels.push(level);
      }

      plb(
        "setEntryContext",
         "ad" ,
        entryPos,
        datasets,
        entryLevels
      );
    })();
  </script>

        "pron": true,

<amp-sidebar id="sidebarDict" layout="nodisplay" side="right" class="bw cm-f i-amphtml-element i-amphtml-layout-nodisplay i-amphtml-overlay i-amphtml-scrollable i-amphtml-built" on="sidebarOpen:AMP.setState({ stateSidebarDict: { open: true } })" hidden="" i-amphtml-layout="nodisplay" role="menu" tabindex="-1">

function readCookie(name) {
    var nameEQ = name + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for ( var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
        var c = ca[i];
        while (c.charAt(0) == ' ')
            c = c.substring(1, c.length);
        if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0)
            return c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length);
    }
    return null;
}

      var posElts = document.getElementsByClassName("pos dpos");
      var entryPos = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < posElts.length; i++) {
        var pos = posElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryPos.indexOf(pos) == -1)
          entryPos.push(pos);
      }

      var levelElts = document.getElementsByClassName("epp-xref dxref");
      var entryLevels = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < levelElts.length; i++) {
        var level = levelElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryLevels.indexOf(level) == -1)
          entryLevels.push(level);
      }

      plb(
        "setEntryContext",
         "am" ,
        entryPos,
        datasets,
        entryLevels
      );
    })();

    <script type="text/plain" class="optanon-category-C0002">
    (function() {
      var datasets = [
                          "ceed-us"               ];

      var posElts = document.getElementsByClassName("pos dpos");
      var entryPos = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < posElts.length; i++) {
        var pos = posElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryPos.indexOf(pos) == -1)
          entryPos.push(pos);
      }

      var levelElts = document.getElementsByClassName("epp-xref dxref");
      var entryLevels = [];

      for (var i = 0; i < levelElts.length; i++) {
        var level = levelElts[i].innerHTML.trim();
        if (entryLevels.indexOf(level) == -1)
          entryLevels.push(level);
      }

      plb(
        "setEntryContext",
         "abandon" ,
        entryPos,
        datasets,
        entryLevels
      );
    })();
  </script>

<amp-sidebar id="sidebarWordList" layout="nodisplay" side="left" class="bw cm-f i-amphtml-element i-amphtml-layout-nodisplay i-amphtml-overlay i-amphtml-scrollable i-amphtml-built" amp-access="loggedIn" amp-access-hide="" hidden="" i-amphtml-layout="nodisplay" role="menu" tabindex="-1">

    <div class="pr hdf hflxy lminh100">
        <div class="pr cm-fc hflx1 lm-auto">
            <span class="pa pt0 pr0 lmt-5 lmr-15 lpt-15 hp fon" role="button" tabindex="0" on="tap:sidebarWordList.close" aria-label="Close" title="Close">
                <i class="i i-close ibd lpr-5" aria-hidden="true"></i>
            </span>

            <div class="han tc-bd lp-15 lpt-5 lpb-25">
                <div class="fs18 lpt-20 lmb-25">My word lists</div>
                <p>Add <strong class="tb">abandon</strong> to one of your lists below, or create a new one.</p>

                <div class="lp-10 lc1 lmb-10">
                    <form class="x i-amphtml-form" id="formAddToWordlistNew" method="post" action-xhr="https://dictionary.cambridge.org/plus/addWordlist" verify-xhr="https://dictionary.cambridge.org/plus/addWordlist" target="_top" on="submit-success:AMP.setState({ stateSidebarWordList: { wordlist_id: event.response.wordlistId } }),formAddToWordlist.submit" novalidate="">
                        <div>
                            <div class="hfr">
                                <button type="submit" class="bo iwc iwc-40 hao lb0" title="Create">
                                    <i class="i i-check" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                                </button>

                                <input type="text" name="name" class="ft fon pr pt0 hbr-20 lc1 lp-10 lpl-15" placeholder="New word list name">

                        </div>
                        <div submitting="">
                            <template type="amp-mustache">
                                <div class="pa p0 lp-5 bl-l">
                                    <div class="pa p0 bload">
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </template>
                        </div>
                        <div submit-error="">
                            <template type="amp-mustache">
                                <div class="fs14 lpt-5 tc-err">
                                    {{#verifyErrors}}
                                        <p>{{message}}</p>
                                    {{/verifyErrors}}
                                    {{^verifyErrors}}
                                        {{#message}}
                                            <p>{{message}}</p>
                                        {{/message}}
                                        {{^message}}
                                            <p>Something went wrong.</p>
                                        {{/message}}
                                    {{/verifyErrors}}
                                </div>
                            </template>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>

[height]="stateSidebarWordListItems.length > 5 ? 195 : (stateSidebarWordListItems.length * 39)" [src]="stateSidebarWordListItems" class="i-amphtml-element i-amphtml-layout-fixed-height i-amphtml-layout-size-defined i-amphtml-built" i-amphtml-layout="fixed-height" style="height: 0px;">
                    <div overflow="" class="hao hp list-overflow" role="button" id="sideBarWordListListsOver">

                                    {{name}}
                                </span>
                            </div>
                        </template>
                <div role="list" class="i-amphtml-fill-content i-amphtml-replaced-content"></div></amp-list>

                                <div class="had lmt-25 lpb-25">Go to your <a class="tb" href="/plus/wordlist">word lists</a></div>

                <form id="formAddToWordlist" method="post" action-xhr="https://dictionary.cambridge.org/plus/addWordlistEntry" verify-xhr="https://dictionary.cambridge.org/plus/addWordlistEntry" target="_top" on="submit-success:formAddToWordlistNew.clear,sidebarWordList.close,AMP.setState({ stateSidebarWordList: { wordlist_id: '', word: event.response.word, wordlist: event.response.wordlist, url: event.response.url } })" novalidate="" class="i-amphtml-form">

                    </div>
                    <div submitting="">
                        <template type="amp-mustache">
                            <div class="pa p0 lp-5 bl-l">
                                <div class="pa p0 bload">
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </template>

                    <div submit-error="">

                                {{/verifyErrors}}
